misc: Struggles with his gender identity, occasionally participating in events under his female alter-ego, "Eva".
biography: Marcus, a distinguished member of Kurk Golf, is known for his unwavering dedication to the sport and his complex persona. A familiar face at the Hector Trophée, Marcus has participated in all eleven previous iterations of the tournament since its inception in 2014.

While the coveted Hector Trophée and the Victor Trophy have eluded him thus far, Marcus remains a formidable competitor, celebrated for his strategic mind and precise execution on the course. He is anticipated to participate in Hector Trophée 2025.

Off the course, Marcus is known for his introspective nature and his exploration of personal identity. On occasion, he has been known to participate in golf events under the guise of his female alter-ego, Eva, showcasing the multifaceted nature of his character.
